objects.query: SELECT Id, Name, DurationType, EstimatedDuration, FS_Type__c, FS_MinDuration__c, FS_MaxDuration__c, ShouldAutoCreateSvcAppt, FS_AutoSchedule__c, ProcedureCode__c, TaskType__c FROM WorkType
SELECT Id, Name, IsActive, RelativeExecutionOrder, Description FROM WorkPlanTemplate
SELECT Id, Name, IsActive, MajorTask__c, Description FROM WorkStepTemplate
SELECT Id, WorkPlanTemplateId, WorkTypeId, IsActive FROM WorkPlanSelectionRule
SELECT Id, WorkPlanTemplateId, WorkStepTemplateId, ExecutionOrder FROM WorkPlanTemplateEntry
